hints.content:
We start at $2{:}05$ when Abby starts drawing.

[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A number line labeled 2:00 to 3:00 with tick marks at every 1 minute. The tick marks at 2:00, 2:15, 2:30, 2:45, and 3:00 are labeled. A red circle appears on the unlabeled 2:05 tick mark. !

hints.content:
To determine what time Abby finishes drawing, we go **right** ${37}$ minutes from $2{:}05$.

[[☃ image 1]]

$\begin{align}
{2{:}05} +{} &\goldE{5}\text{ minutes} = 2{:}10\\\\
{2{:}10} +{} &\purpleD{20}\text{ minutes} = 2{:}30\\\\
2{:}30 +{} & \greenD{10}\text{ minutes} = {2{:}40} \\\\
2{:}40 +{} &\redD{2}\text{ minutes} = \blueD{2{:}42}
\end{align}$

options.alt: A number line labeled 2:00 to 3:00 with tick marks at every 1 minute. The tick marks at 2:00, 2:15, 2:30, 2:45, and 3:00 are labeled. A series of four arrows are shown moving left to right from the 2:05 tick mark to the 2:42 tick mark. The first arrow starts at the 2:05 tick mark and ends at the 2:10 tick mark and is labeled plus 5. The second arrow starts at the 2:10 tick mark and ends at the 2:30 tick mark and is labeled plus 20. The third arrow starts at the 2:30 tick mark and ends at the 2:40 tick mark and is labeled plus 10. The fourth arrow starts at the 2:40 tick mark and ends at the 2:42 tick mark and is labeled plus 2. !

hints.content:
Abby finished drawing at $\blueD{2{:}42} $.  

Which clock shows $\blueD{2{:}42}$?

When Abby finishes drawing, the clock shows:

[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A clock with every hour labeled and tick marks every 1 minute, showing the short hand between the 2 and 3 and the long hand on the second tick mark after the 8. !

question.content:
Abby spends $37$ minutes making sidewalk chalk drawings.  Abby starts drawing at $2{:}05 \text { p.m.}$

**What  time does the clock show when Abby finishes drawing?**

[[☃ radio 1]]

choices.content: ![A clock with every hour labeled and tick marks every 1 minute, showing the short hand between the 2 and 3 and the long hand on the second tick mark after the 6.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/3d441736f3fd3b2e15752dba77dd239115aacb19)

![A clock with every hour labeled and tick marks every 1 minute, showing the short hand between the 2 and 3 and the long hand on the second tick mark after the 7.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/f798021f15870135cc8c18fbb8014063768b3e2f)

![A clock with every hour labeled and tick marks every 1 minute, showing the short hand between the 2 and 3 and the long hand on the second tick mark after the 8.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/f64672c2e5c930db74e9df1eb199ba21442e7065)
